about.title: About
about.description: Support toolkit for King God Castle Vietnam community.
about.toolDescription: Tool to support downloading, converting, managing and sharing resources for the King God Castle community.
about.contributionText: All contributions, feedback or development ideas please send to the channels below.

convert.title: Convert to Unity
convert.description: Convert game from XAPK to Unity
convert.alreadyInstalled: I already have the game installed
convert.note1: Do **not interfere** with the download process; do not let your computer **sleep or turn off screen**.
convert.note2: The conversion process can take from **15 to 45 minutes**, depending on your **computer performance**.
convert.note3: **Do not insert/run any interfering software** during the conversion process.

relic.fileConverterDesc: Convert old game files to new format
